post:
[PaulVPS](https://paulvps.com) is the international brand of Chinese based hosting provider [PaulHost](http://paulhost.com) who was founded in October 2011 and have been providing shared hosting to thousands of clients across China. Now with PaulVPS, we hope to provide services to a larger customer base. 

Here we bring 2 promos to all LowEnd Talk community. 

**QuadraNet LA 256M**
256MB DDR3 Dedicated Ram
256MB VSwap
30GB HW RAID 10 protected Disk
500G monthly Premium Bandwidth
2 Fair Shared Cores
1x IPv4

$2.5 Monthly and $25 anually 
Order: [https://billing.paulvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=39](https://billing.paulvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=39)

**QuadraNet LA 512M**
512MB DDR3 Dedicated Ram
512MB VSwap
50GB HW RAID 10 protected Disk
1000G monthly Premium Bandwidth
4 Fair Shared Cores
1x IPv4
$5 monthly and $50 annually
Order: [https://billing.paulvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=40](https://billing.paulvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=40)


Test IP: 199.30.140.130

We also have OpenVZ services in Phoenix, AZ & Kansas City, Missouri & Frankfurt, Germany and XEN service in San Diego, CA of US.

General Features:
* No long term contract required.
* Hardware RAID 10 protected storage.
* 99.9% uptime guaranteed,you can refer to our SLA.
* 100Mbps premium network connection.
* SolusVM control Panel so users can feel free to reboot or rebuild systems. We have tons of system template to choose from.

Payment Method accepted:
1.Paypal
2.Alipay ( Mainly for Chinese customers )

If you can’t find the right VPS configuration or have any questions, you can post the question here or send an email to sales[at]paulvps.com, or simply initiate a Live Chat session with a sales representative on our site!
